oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andrew Jackson portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Andrew Jackson (1767-1845). Engraving by H. B. Hall from a painting by Vanderlyn in the City Hall, New York. Portrayed young, in military attire. Portrait from waist up, right hand grasping sabor. From "Life of Andrew Jackson, Volume 2," by James Parton.
Seventh President of the United States, serving from 1829-1837.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845;Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845. Works. 1986;Southern States--History--War of 1812
Presidents
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hall, H. B.
